text: NBC is hoping to bring back the “ Must - See TV ” glow to its Thursday lineup with plans to move the breakout hit drama “ This Is Us ” to the 9 p. m. slot this fall. The revival of “ Will & Grace ” will also head to Thursday, anchoring the night at 8 p. m. “ This Is Us ” emerged as a breakout hit for NBC this season in the Tuesday 9 p. m. slot. In February it will also get a plum showcase behind NBC ’ s Super Bowl telecast. “ Our hope is to create the return of ‘ Must - See TV ’ on Thursday, ” NBC Entertainment chairman Bob Greenblatt said in a conference call Sunday.
